response.overview: Justice Devil follows the harrowing yet empowering story of Ellen (played by Ris Yin Min), a mother who escapes the clutches of gang life only to be thrust into a brutal quest for justice after her daughterâ€™s tragic murder.  The film delves into themes of resilience, vengeance, and the unbreakable bond between mother and child. With its intricate narrative and raw emotional depth, Justice Devil offers a fresh perspective on the intersection of familial love and societal undercurrents in Southeast Asia.
response.title: Justice Devil
